dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Informative discussion with one host being skeptical

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, like, three nuclear plants. In Kazakhstan. Three. Does that... really, uh, move the needle for anyone?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, like, three nuclear plants. In Kazakhstan. Three. Does that... really, uh, move the needle for anyone?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Not one, but three nuclear power plants (NPPs) may be built in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, um, President Tokayev is calling it strategically vital. Not just for, like, their current energy needs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, um, President Tokayev is calling it strategically vital. Not just for, like, their current energy needs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is strategically important for Kazakhstan to create a new energy sector that will provide a solid foundation for dynamic economic development for decades to come... The issue is not just about meeting the country's current energy needs," the Head of State said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, current needs. Because they already had, uh, a referendum for the first one, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, current needs. Because they already had, uh, a referendum for the first one, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By approving the decision to build the first NPP at the referendum, citizens have launched the solution to this problem.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And he's saying that referendum launched the solution. So, this is about, uh, thoughtful, comprehensive development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And he's saying that referendum launched the solution. So, this is about, uh, thoughtful, comprehensive development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "By approving the decision to build the first NPP at the referendum, citizens have launched the solution to this problem. This means that we must approach the development of energy thoughtfully, comprehensively, taking into account the long-term perspective.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Thoughtful and comprehensive," for decades to come, sure. Sounds, you know, very politician-y.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thoughtful and comprehensive, for decades to come, sure. Sounds, you know, very politician-y.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's about building a whole new energy sector! A foundation for dynamic economic growth, he said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's about building a whole new energy sector! A foundation for dynamic economic growth, he said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is strategically important for Kazakhstan to create a new energy sector that will provide a solid foundation for dynamic economic development for decades to come, the President noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, that requires a "full-fledged nuclear cluster," apparently. One wasn't good enough?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, that requires a full-fledged nuclear cluster, apparently. One wasn't good enough?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "That is why I consider it necessary to build not one, but three nuclear power plants and ultimately form a full-fledged nuclear cluster," Kassym-Jomart Tokayev emphasized.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, not strategically, no. He explicitly stated not just one, but three, to ensure that long-term vision.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not strategically, no. He explicitly stated not just one, but three, to ensure that long-term vision.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "That is why I consider it necessary to build not one, but three nuclear power plants and ultimately form a full-fledged nuclear cluster," Kassym-Jomart Tokayev emphasized.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. So they're even setting up a whole Nuclear Energy Agency, just for this? Under the President?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. So they're even setting up a whole Nuclear Energy Agency, just for this? Under the President?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In this regard, the Head of State decided to create the Nuclear Energy Agency under the President.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, um, a dedicated agency. It really emphasizes, like, how serious they are about this shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, um, a dedicated agency. It really emphasizes, like, how serious they are about this shift.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: This "shift." All discussed at some, uh, Kurultai session.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This shift. All discussed at some, uh, Kurultai session.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This was stated by President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, speaking at the fourth session of the National Kurultai in Burabay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The National Kurultai is where they, um, discuss key issues for the country's future. This is a key issue, clearly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The National Kurultai is where they, um, discuss key issues for the country's future. This is a key issue, clearly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two-day session of the National Kurultai brings together government officials, public figures, and experts to discuss key issues shaping the countryâ„¢s future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or just, like, a big shiny distraction. Three nuclear plants, that'll fix everything, I'm sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or just, like, a big shiny distraction. Three nuclear plants, that'll fix everything, I'm sure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but it's about, uh, energy independence, creating a stable future. Don't you see the profound economic implications?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but it's about, uh, energy independence, creating a stable future. Don't you see the profound economic implications?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I see, um, a lot of glowing prospects, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I see, um, a lot of glowing prospects, I guess.
